name: Steve
message: The source code for the API gateway in [here on GitHub](https://github.com/InSourceSoftware/spring-ws-examples/tree/master/stateless-session-gateway-example), and the source code for the stateless api is available [here on GitHub](https://github.com/InSourceSoftware/spring-ws-examples/tree/master/stateless-session-api-example) as well.
